15231
Test: public void test11458() throws Exception { Options options = new Options(); options.addOption( OptionBuilder.withValueSeparator( '=' ).hasArgs().create( 'D' ) ); options.addOption( OptionBuilder.withValueSeparator( ':' ).hasArgs().create( 'p' ) ); String[] args = new String[] { "-DJAVA_HOME=/opt/java" , "-pfile1:file2:file3" }; CommandLineParser parser = new PosixParser(); CommandLine cmd = parser.parse(options, args); String[] values = cmd.getOptionValues('D'); values = cmd.getOptionValues('p'); Iterator iter = cmd.iterator(); while (iter.hasNext()) { Option opt = (Option) iter.next(); switch (opt.getId()) { case 'D': break; case 'p': break; default: fail("-D option not found"); } } }
Code: public static Option create(String opt) throws IllegalArgumentException { Option option = new Option(opt, description); option.setLongOpt(longopt); option.setRequired(required); option.setOptionalArg(optionalArg); option.setArgs(numberOfArgs); option.setType(type); option.setValueSeparator(valuesep); option.setArgName(argName); OptionBuilder.reset(); return option; }
